item.title: !nana-an: the custom of calling to the wounded springbok
item.summary: The hunters call to make a wounded springbok die (or 'lie down') quickly (!nana-an). They call out differently for gemsbok and ostriches.
item.comments: 1) This story is found in Book VIII-26
item.author: |hanâ‰ kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)
